cloudActionTooltip.description: Text to explain an action adding a table to Table Capture Cloud.

contextMenuRecipeClipStop.description: A context menu message that stops auto-clipping a recipe with the given name.

contextMenuRefreshNeeded.message: Table Capture: Actualice esta página antes de usar
contextMenuRefreshNeeded.description: A context menu message that tells the user that a refresh is needed.

contextMenuWatchElement.description: A context menu message for watching an element.

contextMenuActivity.description: A context menu message that invokes a recipe with the given name.

copied.description: A message stating that the copy finished.

copying.description: A message stating that the copy is in progress.

copyClipboardAction.description: Link to copy a table to the system clipboard.

copyClipboardActionTooltip.message: Copy table data to the clipboard
copyClipboardActionTooltip.description: Text to explain an action exporting a table to the clipboaard.

copySelectedDescription.message: Copy all the tables selected in the page

csvAction.description: Link to download a table as a CSV file.

csvActionTooltip.message: Download table as a CSV file
csvActionTooltip.description: Text to explain an action exporting a table to a CSV file.

detachPaneAction.description: Link to detach the window so that it's a movable box on the page.  Useful for cases where the window blocks targeted tables.

detachPaneDescription.message: Detach table listing pane to display within the page

dynamicCaptureConfigTooltip.description: Tooltip for the dynamic table capture options.

editActionTooltip.description: Text to explain an action of editing data before exporting it.

editSettingsTooltip.description: Text to explain an action of editing options.

errorNextPageButtonLikelyNotFound.description: A message that the extension could probably not find the next page button.

errorUsingNextPageButtonSelector.message: The 'next page' button was not found.
errorUsingNextPageButtonSelector.description: A message that the extension could probably not find the next page button.

errorUsingNextPageButtonSelectorTooFew.message: The 'next page' button was not found for the provided selector.
errorUsingNextPageButtonSelectorTooFew.description: A message that the extension could probably not find the next page button.

errorUsingNextPageButtonSelectorTooMany.message: The provided 'next page' button selector found more than one button.
errorUsingNextPageButtonSelectorTooMany.description: A message that the extension found too many elements for a selector.

helpAction.description: Link to get help on the extension.

markdownActionTooltip.description: Text to explain an action exporting a table as Markdown.

noTablesFound.description: A message that no tables have been found.

o365ActionTooltip.description: Text to explain an action exporting a table to Office 365.

pageTitleOptions.description: Page title for the options page

pasteToCaptureMessage.message: Table Capture: Just paste from your clipboard to import your data.
pasteToCaptureMessage.description: Message in popup telling user to paste to get the captured table in their google sheet.

proPurchaseInfoNoTrial.message:
Pro costs just $$12 to save yourself hours every week.

Your license is valid for a year.

refreshAction.description: Link to refresh the current listing of tables found on the page.

refreshDescription.message: Click to refresh (for tables created after page-load)

removeAction.description: Link to remove an inline menu or pane from the page.

selectedToExcelDescription.message: Create an Excel spreadsheet from all the tables selected in the page. Each table will be on a separate sheet in your Excel workbook.

selectedToExcelDescriptionSingleSheet.message: Create an Excel spreadsheet from all the tables selected in the page. Tables will be on one sheet in your Excel workbook separated by a blank row.
